title: The hard choices when playing League

My condolences for your agony.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
my university internet in a nutshell.

Always the second one with the addition that people who arent serious about the game are usually asleep between 2-5 am along with most of the toxic kids.  but then again just because you dedicated to play late hours doesnt mean that you are good much like me but unlike most people i play with i know what needs to be done when and have no problem playing from behind

*Adjusts bowtie*

It's time to git gud, boys.
Option B. Always Option B.
**Must not be Bronze**
Is 4am a reasonable hour?
As long as noon is a reasonable time to wake up. ;)
Don't be silly, only after 5am is acceptable.
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CtyJMaaXEAAfrFK.jpg
We need a champ with 6 arms.
{{champion:420}} has lots of arms
{{champion:161}}  *(OBSERVES THIS)*

WHAT DO YOU MEAN it's midnight already?!?! 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
we say git gud but its all queing and surrendering when the enemy gets an early advantage and the enemy surrendering when you get an early advantage
I dont think a few extra hours would help we get gud though. Maybe a few extra years?
It adds up if it's every day

https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwiKiNjUzK7QAhUG4iYKHWDfBXsQjRwIBw&url=http%3A%2F%2Fimgur.com%2Fgallery%2F44bCd&bvm=bv.139138859,d.eWE&psig=AFQjCNFPmeQCIElNbHiGjqbX3vDvrhbj-g&ust=1479431147730715
Praise!
i chose sleep XD
Time to git gud i guess
